sub_title: Test Coordinator | Senior Test Engineer | Scrum Master
summary:
Highly proficient quality assurance engineer (ISTQB and ISEB) with experience in both manual testing and automation testing in Agile development environments. I am also a certified professional Scrum Master and Agile leader. I have a Bachelor of Technology degree in Information Systems and I currently working at CIMSOLUTIONS who assigned me to the Belastingdienst.

With over 9 years' experience in IT, I am accomplished, reliable, adaptable, organized, results and detail-oriented team player with an excellent work ethic, positive attitude, strong time management, and interpersonal skills.
Capable of working independently with minimal direction and I am willing to learn new concepts and implement them.

Fun facts about me. I like to learn new things, No seriously! I learned how to build and install a new kitchen for my mother in law. Also, I learned to make knife from start to finish using 5160 high carbon steel, and lastly, I enjoy doing research as an amateur Genealogist. I have done extensive research on my family tree and have recently concluded establishing my family tree.

contributors.headline: Test Coordinator | Senior Test Engineer | Scrum Master

projects.title: (UJ) Project 3cho: 3rd Year project - Business Analysis
projects.description:
This project involved analyzing any company. We analyzed the Woods paintball field because of the lack of technology. We chose to analyze and automate there value chain.
We had to use different business analysis techniques including Cost analysis, Porters 5 Forces, Stakeholder Analysis, ECI Balance Score Card, Generic value chain analysis, Mind maps and so on.
Our group came 1st place in all categories.

contributors.headline: Test Coordinator | Senior Test Engineer | Scrum Master
Lead Software Developer at Hollard Insurance
ICT | MBA | Certified Google Cloud Engineer

projects.title: (UJ) Second Year Project - ProCon2012 - Development Software
projects.description:
We had to design and program a fully functional conference management system.

The development environment I used was : Visual Studio 2010, Microsoft SQL server and Dreamweaver CS5. I had to create our own database in MS SQL. The Windows Application application that managed and manipulated the data of all of the Staff, Users, Volunteers, Schedule, Maps and Venues etc was coded C#. I had to include Crystal Reports and Excel spreadsheets for the reports. I also designed a website for customers and volunteers to login, look at schedules, book tickets and use Google maps to find venues. The website was coded in HTML, CSS and PHP. Lastly I used jQueryMobile to design a mobile application for users to see there schedule and book extra tickets.

contributors.headline: Test Coordinator | Senior Test Engineer | Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
BELASTINGDIENST : 
Tester/coördinator en Scrum Master.

DOUANE: 
Senior Test Engineer - Mijn functie omvat het testen en automatiseren van zowel nieuwe als bestaande applicaties binnen de Douane, volgens de Agile SAFe methode. Samen met het multidisciplinaire team, bestaande uit ontwikkelaars, een scrummaster en de productowner, bepaal ik de inhoud van het werk tijdens het PI event en voer ik dit uit in 6 sprints van 2 weken. Mijn verantwoordelijkheden omvatten het stellen van kaders en het leiden van het team in het testen, het bepalen van benodigde testen voor kwaliteitsborging, het opstellen en automatiseren van testcases, en het geven van advies over testtooling. Ik draag bij aan geautomatiseerde regressietests, bepaal de mate van automatisering en documentatie, voer geautomatiseerde testsets uit, en draag bij aan het overdragen van testwerkzaamheden aan collega's. Ik voer diverse tests uit, waaronder regressietests, en bereid en borg verschillende testsoorten in een OTAP-omgeving voor. Als tester werk ik nauw samen met het scrumteam, draag bij aan backlog-items, meet en verbeter de werkzaamheden, en deel actief testkennis om de kwaliteit te waarborgen, zowel binnen het team als ketenbreed. Ik ondersteun collega's binnen en buiten het team waar mogelijk.
profile_positions.title: Software Testing Coördinator / Senior Test Engineer / Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Created and maintained the automation framework utilizing Java, Maven, Selenium, Cucumber and using Behavior-Driven Development.
Integrated with Azure Devops and using Azure Pipelines to build, test, and deploy with CI/CD.
Developing test plans and automation tests based on project requirements and technical specifications.
Communicated confidence level in software to all project stakeholders based on coverage and pass rates of automated test cases.
Created and maintained test reports using Maven Cluecumber Report to illustrate coverage of test cases including pass/fail status rates.
Automating API testing using Swagger and Postman to ensure that any code changes do not break the API in production. This was also integrated into a CI/CD pipeline and reported using htmlextra.
Lead special projects such as a web scraping project to pull data from our existing websites for the product analysts to use.
profile_positions.title: Senior Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Utilising test automation frameworks to design and write automation scripts using Selenium WebDriver, C# and XML.
Automating API testing using Swagger and Postman to ensure that any code changes do not break the API in production.
Developing test plans and test cases based on project requirements and technical specifications.
Manually performing testing from start to finish of the software development life cycle including system, acceptance, end-to-end, regression, integration, functional and non-functional testing.
Leading bug triage meetings, document feedback, manage bug assignments and ensure proper closure. Taking ownership of and resolving bugs throughout the life cycle of the project.
Reviewing system requirements from a testing perspective and collaborating with Quality Assurance specialists and software developers to find innovative solutions.
Working proactively and strategically with development team to create new features as well as anticipating and addressing foreseen defects in the proposed solution.
Identifying, investigating and providing feedback regarding issues found in the software. This includes providing detailed information to reproduce and resolve these issues.
profile_positions.title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Lead the development team as a servant leader to adopt Agile values and principles as stated in the Agile manifesto.
Focused on the Agile Scrum process to ensure that the team delivered business value.
Organized and facilitated all Scrum ceremonies such as Daily Stand Up, Product Backlog Refinement, Sprint Planning, Sprint review, Story sizing and Sprint Retrospective.
Coached the team to understand and apply Scrum and Kanban principles.
Focused on achieving optimized “flow”.
Provided guidance to the Product Owner to ensure that the Product backlog was sufficiently sized to enable the team to maintain or exceed their velocity.
Ensured that business value is documented in story notation following INVEST principles and that acceptance criteria were defined.
Facilitated the continuous improvement of Definition of Ready and Definition of Done.
Ensured all work is visualized and that the sprint and backlog boards were kept up to date.
Maintained a high-level understanding at a business functional level of what the team was working on and were expected to work on.
Documented and reported impediments and actively worked on the removal thereof.
Protected the team from interruptions and disruptions i.e. outside disturbances.
Coached the team to be self-organizing, highly collaborative, performance driven to achieve commitments following inspect and adapt principles.
Continuously coached the team to improve, thereby achieving an upward trending velocity to achieve maximum productivity.
Fostered team morale and inter team relationships, while addressing areas of conflict and team growth.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Apart from the responsibilities I had as a Quality Assurance team lead I as set out below, I was further responsible for:
Facilitated scrum ceremonies e.g. sprint planning, sprint demo and retrospective meetings.
Conflict resolution, by focusing on scrum values of openness, honesty and respect.
Forecasted the numbers of deliverables possible in an iteration, based on evidence and reliable sources.
Agile team coaching and ensuring the correct use of the scrum process.
Helped team or individual's to clarify goals and actions to achieve.
Shielded the team from outside distractions and interference's.
Familiarised common development practices, service oriented environments, and Agile practices.
Applied Agile techniques including but not limited to User Stories, Continuous Integration, Acceptance Test Driven Development, Test Driven Development, Continuous Testing, Pairing and Automated Testing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer and Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Identified and applied the benefits of automation and automate regression test suites.
Created an maintained an automated test framework using Selenium WebDriver and Typescript.
Mentored and guided quality assurance specialists ensuring all were trained in product knowledge and capable of performing assigned duties.
Provided direction and guidance to quality assurance specialists on new features.
Developed test plans and test cases based on project requirements and technical specifications.
Manually performed testing from start to finish of the software development life cycle including but not limited to system, acceptance, end-to-end, regression, integration, functional and non-functional testing.
Identified, investigated and provided feedback regarding issues found in the software. This included providing detailed information to reproduce and resolve these issues.
Reviewed system requirements from a testing perspective and collaborated with team members to find optimum solutions.
Worked proactively with members of the development team to find and fix defects in the solutions.
Created and maintained test reports to illustrate coverage of test cases including pass/fail status rates.
Lead bug triage meetings, document feedback, managed bug assignments and ensured proper closure. Take ownership of bugs throughout the life cycle of the project.
Communicated confidence level in software to all project stakeholders based on coverage and pass rates of manual and automated test cases.
Performed accurate and detailed defect and/or change logging, reporting, tracking and maintenance.
Setup and maintained test environments.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Developed test cases and documented results towards manual testing, functional specifications, defect identification, tracking and reporting.
Detected software failures and developed, recommended and monitored corrective and preventative actions.
Manually performed testing from start to finish of the software development life cycle including but not limited to system, acceptance, end-to-end, regression, integration, functional and non-functional testing.
Planed, conducted, monitored testing and inspection of product to ensure finished product quality.
Performed quality test reviews with developers.
Ensured compliance with general testing best practices.
Analysed data to identify areas for improvement in quality procedures.
Recorded and documented results and compare the expected results including but not limited to preparing reports to communicate outcomes of quality activities.
Developed and documented application test plans based on software requirements and technical specifications.
Applied basic security and vulnerability tests.
Adhered to data integrity standards.
Examined code and execution of code in various environments e.g. technical debugging.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Developed websites for real estate companies using HTML 5, CSS 3 and JavaScript.
Developed web services using Amazon Web Services.
Took ownership of general bugs reported by clients and testers.
Developed new functionality and enhancements to the Office Management System, which was a complete online management system for estate agents using Visual Basic.

Tutored students.
Planned student projects and marking tests and final exams.
